relations.Subject: donors
relations.Description:
The main 
donors in this programme cycle will be the national and subnational governments and vertical 
funds such as the Global Environment Facility (GEF) and the Green Climate Fund.

relations.Subject: fund
relations.Description:
At start-up, such a fund needs access to grant financing 
from global trust funds such as the Global Environment Facility (GEF), and this strategy recognizes that 
MIE is working in this direction with the support of the UNDP Climate Change Unit.

relations.Subject: governance
relations.Description:
Environmental 
governance at governmental and community levels, as an integral component of 
sustainable development, will be strengthened thorough policies, plans and legal 
instruments as new opportunities with the Global Environment Facility are 
identified.
